entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
